name: A Cheesy Adventure
description:
A Cheesy Adventure is a playful yet strategic  two-player cooperative platformer game about a cat and a rat who are partners in crime. 

Quick! The cat and the rat are hungry! They want to steal as much cheese as possible from the cheese factory. However, there are many obstacles in the way. Work together and take advantage of your unique strengths to collect the cheese and escape!

Mechanics Include:

  • Split views (Player 1 and Player 2)
  • Moving platforms
  • Closing/opening platforms with buttons
  • Ladders
  • Obstacles such as spikes and angry Mask Dudes
  • Unique skills (cat can jump higher, mice can fit through small holes and swim)

DISCLAIMER: This game is not good due to the fact that it was created by a 9th grader who is just beginning to learn about video game development. The game consists of 4 levels and is fairly short.

Grab a partner and experience the Cheesy Adventure!

Feedback is appreciated.
